answerText: helicases[10] The prototypical DEAD-box helicase is a member of this group of proteins that has the designation 4A. The member of this group designated 2 mediates Met-tRNA binding to the 40S ribosomal subunit.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | WUSTL A - Ottawa | 14 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Members of the largest family of proteins of this type that affect RNA all contain the DEAD-box motif. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this class of enzymes that unwind nucleic acids during processes like transcription and DNA replication.
